enhanced_by.reason: The isValid method relies on the initialization of the RegexValidator object with a set of regular expressions.
The isValid method accesses the patterns array initialized by the constructor, making it a critical state for validation.
The match method also validates a value against the set of regular expressions, making it a potential precursor or follow-up to the isValid method.
The validate method, like isValid, processes the input value against the regular expressions, suggesting a potential sequence of operations.
